column2: "Na EWURADZE see Samuel dɛ
column3: Ibegyam Saul ara ma eekodu dabɛn? Hwɛ
column4: mapow no dɛ ɔyɛ ɔhen wɔ Israel do. Hyɛ w’ambɛn no ngo ma
column6: morosoma wo Bɛtlɛhɛmnyi Jesse hɔ: na mesiesie ɔhen bi ama moho esie wɔ ne mbabanyin no mu."

column2: "Na Samuel see dɛ
column3: Mebɛyɛ dɛn akɔ? Sɛ Saul tse a
column4: oboku me. Na EWURADZE see dɛ
column7: Maba dɛ morobɔbɔ okum afɔr ama EWURADZE."

column2: "Na frɛ Jesse ma ɔmbra afɔr no ho
column3: na mebɛkyerɛ wo dza yɛ: na sera nyia mobɔbɔ ne dzin akyerɛ wo no ma me."

column2: "Na Samuel yɛɛ dza EWURADZE kae no
column3: na ɔbaa Bɛtlɛhɛm. Na kurow no mu mpanyimfo dze ahopopo behyiaa no kwan

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Asomdwee mu a: maba dɛ morobɔbɔ afɔr ama EWURADZE: hom ntsew homho
column4: na wɔnye me nkɔ afɔr no ho. Na ɔtseew Jesse na ne mbabanyin no ho
column5: na ɔfrɛɛ hɔn ma wɔbaa afɔr no ho."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a wɔbae no
column6: Ampa EWURADZE ne nyia wɔasera no no na ɔwɔ n’enyim no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Samuel dɛ
column3: Mma nnhwɛ n’enyim
column4: anaa ne tsipɛn ne tsentsen; osiandɛ memmpɛ no; na EWURADZE nnhwɛ dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa hwɛ; na nyimpa hwɛ dza opue n’enyiwa do
column5: na EWURADZE dze ɔhwɛ akoma mu."

column2: "Nna Jesse frɛɛ Abinadab
column3: ɔmaa otwaa mu wɔ Samuel enyim. Na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Iyi so EWURADZE nnsaan mu nnyii no."

column2: "Nna Jesse maa Samma twaa mu. Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Iyi so EWURADZE nnsaan mu nnyii no."

column2: "Na Jesse maa ne mba beesuon no botwaa mu wɔ Samuel enyim. Na Samuel see Jesse dɛ
column3: EWURADZE nnsaan mu nnyii woyinom mu biara."

column2: "Na Samuel bisaa Jesse dɛ
column3: Ana wo mba nyinara wɔ ha a? Na ɔsee dɛ
column7: ɔrohwɛ nguan. Na Samuel see Jesse dɛ
column8: Soma ma wɔnkɛfa no mbra: na yɛrenntsena ase

column2: "Na ɔsomae ma wɔkɛfaa no bae. Na ɔber
column3: n’enyim yɛ fɛw
column4: na no ho so yɛ fɛw. Na EWURADZE see dɛ
column6: sera no: na ɔno nye yi."

column2: "Nna Samuel faa ngo ambɛn no
column3: na ɔseraa no wɔ no nuanom no hɔn finimfin: na ofitsi da no ara dze kɔ no EWURADZE no sunsum baa David do dzendzenndzen. Na Samuel soɛree

column2: "Afei EWURADZE no sunsum fii Saul ho firii
column3: na sunsum bɔn fi EWURADZE hɔ bɛtseetsee no."

column2: "Na Saul no nkowaa see no dɛ
column3: Afei hwɛ ɛ
column4: sunsum bɔn bi na ofi Nyankopɔn hɔ rehaw wo yi."

column2: "Wɔmma hɛn wura nhyɛ no nkowaa a wɔwɔ w’enyim yi
column3: ma wɔnkɔhwehwɛ nyimpa a onyim sanku bɔ papanara: ama ɔba dɛ sɛ sunsum bɔn no fi Nyankopɔn nkyɛn ba wo do a

column2: "Na Saul see no nkowaa no dɛ
column3: Afei hom nhwehwɛ nyimpa a onyim bɔ yie mma me na hom mfa no mbrɛ me."

column2: "Nna mberantsɛ no mu baako see dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: mehu Bɛtlɛhɛmnyi Jesse ne babanyin bi a onyim bɔ papaara
column5: na ɔbarimba katakyi a ɔyɛ ndam a

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Saul tuu abɔfo ma wɔkɔr Jesse hɔ kɛsee dɛ
column3: Gya wo babanyin David a ɔwɔ nguan no nkyɛn no kwan

column2: "Na Jesse faa asoaso dze boodoo
column3: na wenyin bɔdambɔ
column5: na ɔdze somaa ne babanyin David ma ɔdze kɛmaa Saul."

column2: "Na David baa Saul hɔ
column3: na ɔbɔsoom no: na Saul dɔɔ no kɛsenara; na ɔbɛyɛɛ n’akodzesoafo."

column2: "Na Saul somae ma wɔkɔr Jesse hɔ
column3: dɛ
column5: ma David ntsena mo som mu; osiandɛ oenya m’enyim enyimnyam."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: sɛ sunsum bɔn no fi Nyankopɔn hɔ ba Saul do a
column4: nna David afa sanku no na ɔabɔ: nna Saul noho atɔ no
column6: nna sunsum bɔn no efi no do kɔ."
